overview: The best roommates pay rent on time and swallow. These extremely hot and horny studs claim they're straight...But they always leave their doors wide open. If you really wanted to rest, you should have locked your door. These drop-dead gorgeous boys make their neighbors crave for their tight butt holes. Try to figure out which is better: waking up to a blowjob or waking up to a rimjob.
title: My Straight Roommate 11
